item.title: Talks
item.description: I haven’t given any talks yet. My goal is to speak at a conference by July 2020.

item.title: Impact List
item.description:
A collection of things that have impacted my life along with the reason(s) why.

  • Greg Bauges: Developers and Depression

item.title: Site Blurb
item.description:
My name is Andrew, but I also go by Drew for short.

I'm currently living in San Francisco and doing software engineering at Gusto. We're building the people platform to empower businesses to be successful.

I grew up in the Bay Area, did my undergraduate studies at UCLA in Cognitive Science, spent a year living and working in Plano, TX, and now I'm back home.

If you would like to get in touch, I prefer email as a method of communication.

Here are some things I've written over the years.
